name: Subsemiring.op_toSubmonoid
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring R
⊢ Eq S.op.toSubmonoid S.op
decl:
/-- Pull a subsemiring back to an opposite subsemiring along `MulOpposite.unop` -/
@[simps! coe toSubmonoid]
protected def op (S : Subsemiring R) : Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ where
  toSubmonoid := S.toSubmonoid.op
  add_mem' {x} {y} hx hy := add_mem (show x.unop ∈ S from hx) (show y.unop ∈ S from hy)
  zero_mem' := zero_mem S

name: Subsemiring.coe_op
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring R
⊢ Eq (↑S.op) (Set.preimage MulOpposite.unop ↑S)
decl:
/-- Pull a subsemiring back to an opposite subsemiring along `MulOpposite.unop` -/
@[simps! coe toSubmonoid]
protected def op (S : Subsemiring R) : Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ where
  toSubmonoid := S.toSubmonoid.op
  add_mem' {x} {y} hx hy := add_mem (show x.unop ∈ S from hx) (show y.unop ∈ S from hy)
  zero_mem' := zero_mem S

name: Subsemiring.mem_op
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
x : MulOpposite R
S : Subsemiring R
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem S.op x) (Membership.mem S (MulOpposite.unop x))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mem_op {x : Rᵐᵒᵖ} {S : Subsemiring R} : x ∈ S.op ↔ x.unop ∈ S := Iff.rfl

name: Subsemiring.coe_unop
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring (MulOpposite R)
⊢ Eq (↑S.unop) (Set.preimage MulOpposite.op ↑S)
decl:
/-- Pull an opposite subsemiring back to a subsemiring along `MulOpposite.op` -/
@[simps! coe toSubmonoid]
protected def unop (S : Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ) : Subsemiring R where
  toSubmonoid := S.toSubmonoid.unop
  add_mem' {x} {y} hx hy := add_mem
    (show MulOpposite.op x ∈ S from hx) (show MulOpposite.op y ∈ S from hy)
  zero_mem' := zero_mem S

name: Subsemiring.unop_toSubmonoid
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring (MulOpposite R)
⊢ Eq S.unop.toSubmonoid S.unop
decl:
/-- Pull an opposite subsemiring back to a subsemiring along `MulOpposite.op` -/
@[simps! coe toSubmonoid]
protected def unop (S : Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ) : Subsemiring R where
  toSubmonoid := S.toSubmonoid.unop
  add_mem' {x} {y} hx hy := add_mem
    (show MulOpposite.op x ∈ S from hx) (show MulOpposite.op y ∈ S from hy)
  zero_mem' := zero_mem S

name: Subsemiring.mem_unop
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
x : R
S : Subsemiring (MulOpposite R)
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem S.unop x) (Membership.mem S (MulOpposite.op x))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mem_unop {x : R} {S : Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ} : x ∈ S.unop ↔ MulOpposite.op x ∈ S := Iff.rfl

name: Subsemiring.unop_op
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring R
⊢ Eq S.op.unop S
decl:
@[simp]
theorem unop_op (S : Subsemiring R) : S.op.unop = S := rfl

name: Subsemiring.op_unop
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring (MulOpposite R)
⊢ Eq S.unop.op S
decl:
@[simp]
theorem op_unop (S : Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ) : S.unop.op = S := rfl

name: Subsemiring.op_le_iff
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S₁ : Subsemiring R
S₂ : Subsemiring (MulOpposite R)
⊢ Iff (LE.le S₁.op S₂) (LE.le S₁ S₂.unop)
decl:
theorem op_le_iff {S₁ : Subsemiring R} {S₂ : Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ} : S₁.op ≤ S₂ ↔ S₁ ≤ S₂.unop :=
  MulOpposite.op_surjective.forall

name: Subsemiring.le_op_iff
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S₁ : Subsemiring (MulOpposite R)
S₂ : Subsemiring R
⊢ Iff (LE.le S₁ S₂.op) (LE.le S₁.unop S₂)
decl:
theorem le_op_iff {S₁ : Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ} {S₂ : Subsemiring R} : S₁ ≤ S₂.op ↔ S₁.unop ≤ S₂ :=
  MulOpposite.op_surjective.forall

name: Subsemiring.op_le_op_iff
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S₁ S₂ : Subsemiring R
⊢ Iff (LE.le S₁.op S₂.op) (LE.le S₁ S₂)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem op_le_op_iff {S₁ S₂ : Subsemiring R} : S₁.op ≤ S₂.op ↔ S₁ ≤ S₂ :=
  MulOpposite.op_surjective.forall

name: Subsemiring.unop_le_unop_iff
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S₁ S₂ : Subsemiring (MulOpposite R)
⊢ Iff (LE.le S₁.unop S₂.unop) (LE.le S₁ S₂)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem unop_le_unop_iff {S₁ S₂ : Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ} : S₁.unop ≤ S₂.unop ↔ S₁ ≤ S₂ :=
  MulOpposite.unop_surjective.forall

name: Subsemiring.opEquiv_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring R
⊢ Eq (Subsemiring.opEquiv S) S.op
decl:
/-- A subsemiring `S` of `R` determines a subsemiring `S.op` of the opposite ring `Rᵐᵒᵖ`. -/
@[simps]
def opEquiv : Subsemiring R ≃o Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ where
  toFun := Subsemiring.op
  invFun := Subsemiring.unop
  left_inv := unop_op
  right_inv := op_unop
  map_rel_iff' := op_le_op_iff

name: Subsemiring.opEquiv_symm_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring (MulOpposite R)
⊢ Eq ((RelIso.symm Subsemiring.opEquiv) S) S.unop
decl:
/-- A subsemiring `S` of `R` determines a subsemiring `S.op` of the opposite ring `Rᵐᵒᵖ`. -/
@[simps]
def opEquiv : Subsemiring R ≃o Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ where
  toFun := Subsemiring.op
  invFun := Subsemiring.unop
  left_inv := unop_op
  right_inv := op_unop
  map_rel_iff' := op_le_op_iff

name: Subsemiring.op_injective
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
⊢ Function.Injective Subsemiring.op
decl: theorem op_injective : (@Subsemiring.op R _).Injective := opEquiv.injective

name: Subsemiring.unop_injective
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
⊢ Function.Injective Subsemiring.unop
decl: theorem unop_injective : (@Subsemiring.unop R _).Injective := opEquiv.symm.injective

name: Subsemiring.op_inj
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S T : Subsemiring R
⊢ Iff (Eq S.op T.op) (Eq S T)
decl: @[simp] theorem op_inj {S T : Subsemiring R} : S.op = T.op ↔ S = T := opEquiv.eq_iff_eq

name: Subsemiring.unop_inj
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S T : Subsemiring (MulOpposite R)
⊢ Iff (Eq S.unop T.unop) (Eq S T)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem unop_inj {S T : Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ} : S.unop = T.unop ↔ S = T := opEquiv.symm.eq_iff_eq

name: Subsemiring.op_bot
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
⊢ Eq Bot.bot.op Bot.bot
decl:
@[simp]
theorem op_bot : (⊥ : Subsemiring R).op = ⊥ := opEquiv.map_bot

name: Subsemiring.op_eq_bot
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring R
⊢ Iff (Eq S.op Bot.bot) (Eq S Bot.bot)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem op_eq_bot {S : Subsemiring R} : S.op = ⊥ ↔ S = ⊥ := op_injective.eq_iff' op_bot

initialProofState:
R : Type u_2

⊢ Eq Bot.bot.unop Bot.bot
decl:
@[simp]

inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring (MulOpposite R)
⊢ Iff (Eq S.unop Bot.bot) (Eq S Bot.bot)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem unop_eq_bot {S : Subsemiring Rᵐᵒᵖ} : S.unop = ⊥ ↔ S = ⊥ := unop_injective.eq_iff' unop_bot

theorem op_top : (⊤ : Subsemiring R).op = ⊤ := rfl

initialProofState:

name: Subsemiring.op_sup
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S₁ S₂ : Subsemiring R
⊢ Eq (Max.max S₁ S₂).op (Max.max S₁.op S₂.op)
decl:
theorem op_sup (S₁ S₂ : Subsemiring R) : (S₁ ⊔ S₂).op = S₁.op ⊔ S₂.op :=
  opEquiv.map_sup _ _

name: Subsemiring.unop_sup
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S₁ S₂ : Subsemiring (MulOpposite R)
⊢ Eq (Max.max S₁ S₂).unop (Max.max S₁.unop S₂.unop)
decl:

decl: theorem op_inf (S₁ S₂ : Subsemiring R) : (S₁ ⊓ S₂).op = S₁.op ⊓ S₂.op := rfl

initialProofState:

name: Subsemiring.op_sSup
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Set (Subsemiring R)
⊢ Eq (SupSet.sSup S).op (SupSet.sSup (Set.preimage Subsemiring.unop S))
decl:
theorem op_sSup (S : Set (Subsemiring R)) : (sSup S).op = sSup (.unop ⁻¹' S) :=
  opEquiv.map_sSup_eq_sSup_symm_preimage _

decl:

⊢ Eq (iSup S).op (iSup fun i => (S i).op)
decl: theorem op_iSup (S : ι → Subsemiring R) : (iSup S).op = ⨆ i, (S i).op := opEquiv.map_iSup _

initialProofState:
ι : Sort u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R

⊢ Eq (iSup S).unop (iSup fun i => (S i).unop)
decl:

  opEquiv.symm.map_iSup _

ι : Sort u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R

decl: theorem op_iInf (S : ι → Subsemiring R) : (iInf S).op = ⨅ i, (S i).op := opEquiv.map_iInf _

initialProofState:
ι : Sort u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R

⊢ Eq (iInf S).unop (iInf fun i => (S i).unop)
decl:

name: Subsemiring.op_closure
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
s : Set R
⊢ Eq (Subsemiring.closure s).op (Subsemiring.closure (Set.preimage MulOpposite.unop s))
decl:
theorem op_closure (s : Set R) : (closure s).op = closure (MulOpposite.unop ⁻¹' s) := by
  simp_rw [closure, op_sInf, Set.preimage_setOf_eq, coe_unop]
  congr with a
  exact MulOpposite.unop_surjective.forall

name: Subsemiring.unop_closure
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
s : Set (MulOpposite R)
⊢ Eq (Subsemiring.closure s).unop (Subsemiring.closure (Set.preimage MulOpposite.op s))
decl:
theorem unop_closure (s : Set Rᵐᵒᵖ) : (closure s).unop = closure (MulOpposite.op ⁻¹' s) := by
  rw [← op_inj, op_unop, op_closure]
  simp_rw [Set.preimage_preimage, MulOpposite.op_unop, Set.preimage_id']

name: Subsemiring.addEquivOp_apply_coe
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring R
a : Subtype fun a => Membership.mem S.toSubmonoid a
⊢ Eq (↑(S.addEquivOp a)) (MulOpposite.op ↑a)
decl:
/-- Bijection between a subsemiring `S` and its opposite. -/
@[simps!]
def addEquivOp (S : Subsemiring R) : S ≃+ S.op where
  toEquiv := S.toSubmonoid.equivOp
  map_add' _ _ := rfl

-- TODO: Add this for `[Add]Submonoid` and `[Add]Subgroup`

name: Subsemiring.addEquivOp_symm_apply_coe
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring R
b : Subtype fun b => Membership.mem S.op b
⊢ Eq (↑(S.addEquivOp.symm b)) (MulOpposite.unop ↑b)
decl:
/-- Bijection between a subsemiring `S` and its opposite. -/
@[simps!]
def addEquivOp (S : Subsemiring R) : S ≃+ S.op where
  toEquiv := S.toSubmonoid.equivOp
  map_add' _ _ := rfl

-- TODO: Add this for `[Add]Submonoid` and `[Add]Subgroup`

name: Subsemiring.ringEquivOpMop_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring R
a✝ : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem S x
⊢ Eq (S.ringEquivOpMop a✝) (MulOpposite.op (S.addEquivOp a✝))
decl:
/-- Bijection between a subsemiring `S` and `MulOpposite` of its opposite. -/
@[simps!]
def ringEquivOpMop (S : Subsemiring R) : S ≃+* (S.op)ᵐᵒᵖ where
  __ := S.addEquivOp.trans MulOpposite.opAddEquiv
  map_mul' _ _ := rfl

-- TODO: Add this for `[Add]Submonoid` and `[Add]Subgroup`

name: Subsemiring.ringEquivOpMop_symm_apply_coe
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring R
a✝ : MulOpposite (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem S.op x)
⊢ Eq (↑(S.ringEquivOpMop.symm a✝)) (MulOpposite.unop ↑(MulOpposite.unop a✝))
decl:
/-- Bijection between a subsemiring `S` and `MulOpposite` of its opposite. -/
@[simps!]
def ringEquivOpMop (S : Subsemiring R) : S ≃+* (S.op)ᵐᵒᵖ where
  __ := S.addEquivOp.trans MulOpposite.opAddEquiv
  map_mul' _ _ := rfl

name: Subsemiring.mopRingEquivOp_apply_coe
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : NonAssocSemiring R
S : Subsemiring R
a✝ : MulOpposite (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem S x)
⊢ Eq (↑(S.mopRingEquivOp a✝)) (MulOpposite.op ↑(MulOpposite.unop a✝))
decl:
/-- Bijection between `MulOpposite` of a subsemiring `S` and its opposite. -/
@[simps!]
def mopRingEquivOp (S : Subsemiring R) : Sᵐᵒᵖ ≃+* S.op where
  __ := MulOpposite.opAddEquiv.symm.trans S.addEquivOp

initialProofState:

⊢ Eq (S.mopRingEquivOp.symm a✝) (MulOpposite.op (S.addEquivOp.symm a✝))
